com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPTimePicker

java.lang.Object
  RelativeLayout
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPTimePicker
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WPTimePicker
extends RelativeLayout

WPTimePicker is the layout behind WPTimePickerActivity, which should be called using startActivityForResult(Intent, int) for soliciting a time of day from a user.

Change log: Version 1.01

  • Methods for localization, ie. setDoneText
  • Using Bundle to save state

Since:
17-03-2012

Nested Class Summary
static class WPTimePicker.CircularArrayAdapter<T>
          Deprecated. An ArrayAdapter that allows for scrolling in both directions infinitely!
static class WPTimePicker.CircularTimeAdapter<T>
          Deprecated. Modified WPTimePicker.CircularArrayAdapter that styles its views accordingly and scrolls infinitely when set to the middle (It is actually limited to 1 billion up/ down).
static class WPTimePicker.WPTimeItem
          Deprecated.  
static class WPTimePicker.WPTimeListItem
          Deprecated. A WPTextView with a forced, square layout.

getTime

public java.lang.String getTime()
Deprecated. 
Returns:
The current selected time in the following format: (h|k):mm(AM|PM) based on the user's settings, ie. 24-hour is k:mm, 12-hour is h:mm(AM|PM).
